questions.title: Interview Questions
questions.description: We have collected 10,000+ questions from real IT interviews. Choose your specialty, adjust the difficulty level and prepare for the interview in practice.
questions.first: What is Virtual DOM, and how does it work?

second.title: What types of data are there in JS?
second.answer:
A value in JavaScript always refers to data of a certain type. For example, it can be a string or a number. There are eight main types of data in JavaScript. In this chapter we will look at them in general, and in the following chapters we will talk in more detail about each one.

A variable in JavaSctipt can contain any data. At one point there may be

main.subtitle: Develop and improve your skills on one platform: learn new things, prepare for conversations, immerse yourself in nuances or update your knowledge - YeaHub will help you cope with any task

first.title: Large database of questions

second.title: Learning progress

training.title: Convenient simulator
training.subtitle.tablet: In YeaHub, everyone will find new learning opportunities.
training.subtitle: Practice the topics you've learned in our simulator.

advantages.first: Our simulator provides a unique chance to deepen your knowledge and take it to a new level
advantages.second: Learning technology has never been so accessible and effective

training_interview.title: Interview trainer
training_interview.subtitle:
Turn preparation into a game! Our interactive trainer will help you 
effectively memorize information and pass interviews
 with confidence.
training_interview.subtitle.tablet: Repeat Mode — practice with questions you’ve already tackled.

advantages.first: Memorization mode — learn new topics with a smart repetition algorithm
advantages.second: Flexible customization — choose difficulty level, key skills, and IT specialties

ready.interview.title: Get ready for IT interviews
ready.interview.subtitle: With YeaHub, preparing for an interview becomes a simple and exciting process.

advantages.first: Our platform offers an extensive database of relevant questions on a wide range of topics and skills, which is regularly updated.
advantages.second: Use convenient filters to search for questions on topics of interest to you and the level of complexity.

interview.title: interview mode
interview.subtitle: This is the perfect way to prepare for real job interviews.

advantages.first: Practice the topics you've learned in interview mode.
advantages.second: Use convenient memory cards and the ability to save material for later repetition.

progress.title: track your progress
progress.subtitle: YeaHub provides advanced tools to monitor your learning

advantages.first: Detailed statistics are available in your personal profile, including the number of completed questions and topics.
advantages.second: Identify your current level and identify knowledge gaps for more focused learning or job search preparation.

footer.slogan: Choose what IT will be like tomorrow, together with us
footer.title: Choose what IT will look like tomorrow — join us!
footer.about: YeaHub is a completely open project designed to unite and improve the IT sphere. Our source code is available for viewing on GitHub. The design of the project is also open for review in Figma.

history.title: Your progress is your success

slides.first: How many questions have you mastered already?

mentors.title: MENTORS WITH HANDS-ON EXPERIENCE AT YEAHUB
mentors.description: At YeaHub, we believe that the best learning comes through practice. That’s why we’ve brought together mentors from different fields so that students can learn through real projects.

guru.title: Gurus at YeaHub
guru.description: In YeaHub, there are not only mentors who lead internships on projects, but also Gurus — mentors who help us develop the platform and make learning even more valuable. They add up-to-date interview questions and write explanations of complex topics.
